column1: Step 2: Select the "One-way" option from the dropdown not return or roundtrip.
Step 3: Type "New York" into the "From" (origin) city input field and select the suggestion.
Step 4: Type "Los Angeles" into the "To" (destination) city input field and select the suggestion.
Step 5: Click on the departure date input field and select a date two weeks from today's date.
